entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
